books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: A look at the postwar manhunt for members of Hitler’s inner circle.
books.name: KILLING THE SS

books.author: by Tucker Carlson
books.description: The Fox News anchor argues that America’s ruling class is out of touch with everyday citizens.
books.name: SHIP OF FOOLS

books.author: by Michael Beschloss
books.description: How American presidents waged wars and expanded the power of the executive branch.
books.name: PRESIDENTS OF WAR

books.author: by Bob Woodward
books.description: Based on hours of interviews with sources, the Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist describes debates and decision-making within the Trump White House.
books.name: FEAR

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: The author of "The Big Short" examines how the Trump administration staffs its federal agencies.
books.name: THE FIFTH RISK

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Sally Field
books.description: A memoir by the two-time Academy Award and three-time Emmy Award winner.
books.name: IN PIECES

books.author: by Doris Kearns Goodwin
books.description: The challenges that shaped the leadership abilities of four presidents: Abraham Lincoln, Theodore Roosevelt, Franklin D. Roosevelt and Lyndon B. Johnson.
books.name: LEADERSHIP

books.author: by Scott Harrison with Lisa Sweetingham
books.description: A memoir by the founder of the nonprofit Charity: Water.
books.name: THIRST

books.author: by Dan Bongino and D.C. McAllister with Matt Palumbo
books.description: A case for how President Trump’s opponents tried to sabotage the 2016 election.
books.name: SPYGATE

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Rebecca Traister
books.description: The history and cultural significance of women's anger.
books.name: GOOD AND MAD

books.author: by Michael Savage
books.description: The conservative commentator uses the Salem Witch Trials and the Red Scares of the early 20th century to contextualize criticisms of President Trump.
books.name: STOP MASS HYSTERIA

books.author: by Jeanine Pirro
books.description: The legal analyst and Fox News host argues in favor of President Trump.
books.name: LIARS, LEAKERS AND LIBERALS
